About

Professional

As a budding full-stack web developer, I'm fully immersed in learning through The Odin Project and Harvard's CS50. My former experience in Esports has endowed me with a strategic mindset and resilience, both of which fuel my programming endeavors.

Portfolio

Restaurant Web Design

In this project, I Developed a dynamic restaurant homepage that fully utilizes JavaScript for DOM manipulation to render all content. The project demonstrates skills in creating a modular JavaScript structure, employing Webpack for bundling, and writing clean, maintainable code. It features interactive tabs for the menu and contact information, showcasing the ability to build a user-friendly, single-page web application.

Repository Live Page

Weather App

For this task I implemented an interactive weather forecast application that interfaces with the Weather API. This application demonstrates proficiency in API integration, asynchronous JavaScript (async/await), and dynamically updating the DOM based on user input. Features include a location-based search and temperature unit toggle between Fahrenheit and Celsius, with a responsive design that adapts the page aesthetic to the current weather conditions

Repository Live Page

ToDo App

Here I developed a comprehensive to-do list application showcasing object-oriented programming with constructors and classes. This application includes features such as task objects with attributes like title, description, dueDate, and priority level. It allows for project categorization, task editing, prioritization, and employs localStorage for data persistence. This project demonstrates a clear understanding of CRUD operations, modular coding practices, and date manipulation using date-fns library.

Repository Live Page

BattleShips Game

In this Battleship game project, I applied Test Driven Development to build game logic that allows for dynamic ship placement and attack coordination on a gameboard. My code enables player turns against an AI opponent and checks for win conditions, showcasing my skills in JavaScript logic, event handling, and DOM manipulation.

Repository Live Page
